q:
Which of the following statements about the Qlik Sense architecture services are correct:
1) Qlik Sense Proxy (QSP) is the entry point for users and administrators through sources like hub and management console.
2) Qlik Sense Schedule(QSS) is used to coordinate the data loads and application reloading.
3) Qlik Sense Engine (QIX) is the place for all data and information related to the configuration and management of other Qlik Sense services.
4) Qlik Sense Applications (.QVF) is the last layer for users to use the data for creating visualizations and sheets in Qlik Sense.

Which of the following statements about the Qlik Sense visualization software is correct:
1) It operates with an associative QIX engine which enables the user to link and associate data from varied sources.
2) It serves as a data analytics platform for a wide range of users.

Which of the following services are managed by the Qlik Sense management console:
1) Data filtering
2) Data monitoring
3) Data connectivity
4) Auditing

Which of the following statements about the advantages of using the Qlik Sense visualization software are correct:
1) It is compatible with all sorts of devices like desktop, tablets, laptops, mobile phones.
2) The centralized hub acts as a platform for collaboration and sharing information, data, reports, applications with both primary and secondary users.
3) Its scalability allows many users to work on the same application at a single time.

Which of the following statements about the disadvantages of using the Qlik Sense visualization software are correct:
1) More than usual memory space is used while working in the mode of analysis.
2) Issues in loading data in the script or data load editor.
3) Reporting of the final data analysis is made easier by features like report sharing.
